findings.title: Improper Fee Handling Of Deposit
findings.description: The `depositFee` is not properly handled in the `PolysynthVault` contract, which could be bypassed in certain cases.

findings.title: Inconsistency in Decimal Handling Between Functions
findings.description: The `averagePriceForOffer()` function uses a hard-coded value `(10**8)` instead of the constant value `OTOKEN_DECIMALS`, while the `_swap()` function uses the constant value `OTOKEN_DECIMALS` in the calculation of price, leading to inconsistent decimal handling between functions.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: The `owner` account has privileged accesses to set the `borrower` who can take all funds from the vault without collateral.
